# endeavr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The endeavr package is an example package to test out various functionalities of Rstudio as part of the EndeavR short course at the university of Bordeaux.

## Installation

You can install the development version of endeavr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("arthurhughes27/endeavr")
```
